```{r}
drive3 <- drive %>%
  mutate(`Exam Result` = as.factor(`Exam Result`),
         `Booking Type` = as.factor(`Booking Type`))
regmodel <- glm(`Exam Result` ~ `Booking Type` + `Number of Examinations`, data = drive3)

```


```{r}
drivedum <- dummy_cols(drive, select_columns =  c('Booking Type', 'Exam Result', 'Product Type Name'),
                       remove_selected_columns = TRUE)
train <- drivedum[1:252813,]
test <- drivedum[252814:337084,]

logmodel <- glm(`Exam Result_PASS` ~`Booking Type_Private` + `Number of Examinations` + `Product Type Name_CLASS C - CAR (MANUAL)`+ `Product Type Name_CLASS CA - CAR (AUTOMATIC)`+ `Product Type Name_CLASS HC - HEAVY COMBINATION VEHICLE`+ `Product Type Name_CLASS HR - HEAVY RIGID VEHICLE`+ `Product Type Name_CLASS LR - LIGHT RIGID VEHICLE`+ `Product Type Name_CLASS MR - MEDIUM RIGID VEHICLE`+ `Product Type Name_CLASS R - MOTORCYCLE (OVER 250CC)`, family=binomial(link='logit'),data=train)

summary(logmodel)
anova(logmodel, test="Chisq")
```

```{r accuracy}
fitted.results <- predict(logmodel,newdata=test,type='response')
fitted.results <- ifelse(fitted.results > 0.5,1,0)
misClasificError <- mean(fitted.results != test$`Exam Result_PASS`)
print(paste('Accuracy',1-misClasificError))
```
